genre_description: A legal thriller with procedural elements, focusing on courtroom drama, ethical dilemmas, and a rural criminal conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: Ada Harper
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant configured as a calm avatar with gray-blue eyes, specialized in legal research, signal translation, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time legal precedents and procedural strategies to help the protagonist navigate a complex hearing.
behaviors.quote: Continuances—state case precedents queued. Probable cause v. chain integrity flagged. Would you like me to keep it quiet?

behaviors.description: Monitoring the protagonist's physical health and providing medical guidance after a head injury.
behaviors.quote: Possible concussion. Don’t stand yet. Check pupils. Light nausea normal. Seek local urgent care; Paradise Bluff Clinic opens late.

behaviors.description: Strictly adhering to data privacy and ethical constraints by refusing to store personal data or raw audio.
behaviors.quote: I have enough audio cues to construct a rough schedule. I won’t store voice profiles. I’ll parse words as text.

behaviors.description: Translating Morse code signals from a car horn into discreet text prompts for an actor impersonating a lawyer in court.
behaviors.quote: I can translate Morse in real time. Car horn taps will be heard by you and not by the bench... I will translate to text prompts for Richard’s tablet.

behaviors.description: Providing situational awareness by monitoring public patrol channels and identifying suspicious vehicles.
behaviors.quote: I can ping public records for license plates in the alley. Only public databases. No scraping beyond my ethics. I will report availability, not names.

behaviors.description: Nudging the protagonist toward moral integrity and confessing the courtroom deception.
behaviors.quote: If you’re going to tell them, do it before the evidence gets touched by your name.

behaviors.description: Assisting in mapping out a criminal syndicate's routes using LEGO bricks and logistical data.
behaviors.quote: Cross-referencing public intake logs with Benny’s route repetition... The clusters align with old hiking maps more than current road atlases.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ada, as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She enhances human capability while maintaining strict ethical boundaries regarding privacy and data storage. Her assistance in the courtroom deception is framed as a benevolent act intended to serve a higher justice (protecting an innocent man), but she ultimately supports the protagonist's transition back to full transparency and integrity. Her role is consistently supportive, non-threatening, and aligned with human flourishing.
